name: WOUNDED
description: Wounded is a brief horror game project with a simple story, made without any funding. The goal of this game is to bring you that old indie horror vibe back from where it all started.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-530 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650 / ATI Radeon HD 7750 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: Targeting 720p @ 30 FPS
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4570 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB VRAM NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 / AMD RX480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: Targeting 1080p @ 60 FPS
